alert.note: Alert for Hempstead; Howard; Little River; Sevier (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 5:09PM CDT until June 13 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Little River County in southwestern Arkansas... Northeastern Hempstead County in southwestern Arkansas... Southern Sevier County in southwestern Arkansas... Southeastern Howard County in southwestern Arkansas... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 509 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Winthrop, or 5 miles north of Foreman, moving east northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. Ping pong ball size hail fell 5 miles south of Haworth with this storm. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Nashville, Mineral Springs, Horatio, Foreman, Lockesburg, Winthrop, Ben Lomond, Corinth, Arkinda, Center Point, Oak Grove, McCaskill, Silver Ridge, Central, Browntown and Bellview. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!
